root.name: Sexy Poker
root.description: Banned in AustraliaAustralia's Classification Board refused to give Sexy Poker a rating, thus banning the title for being released in Australia. They felt the fact that you were being rewarded with (near) nudity was unacceptable for a 15 rating, their highest rating. Australia currently does not have a 18 or "M" equivalent rating, which results in a lot of games not coming out in the country.
